--- title: "Old Faithful" format: html: css: include/webex.css include-after-body: include/webex.js --- ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(webexercises) #| eval: false #| results: asis # Define the questions q1 <- "What is the name of the main character in 'Mansfield Park'?" q2 <- "Who is the author of Mansfield Park?" q3 <- "Where is the main setting of Mansfield Park?" q4 <- "Who is Fanny Price's wealthy uncle in Mansfield Park?" q5 <- "Who is Fanny Price's love interest in Mansfield Park?" # Define the answer choices q1_choices <- c("Elizabeth", "Mary", answer= "Fanny", "Catherine") q2_choices <- c( answer= "Jane Austen", "Charlotte Bronte", "Emily Bronte", "Agatha Christie") q3_choices <- c("London", "Bath", "Manchester", answer= "Mansfield Park") q4_choices <- c( answer= "Sir Thomas Bertram", "Mr. Price", "Mr. Crawford", "Mr. Rushworth") q5_choices <- c( answer= "Edmund Bertram", "Tom Bertram", "Henry Crawford", "William Price") cat(q1,longmcq(q1_choices)) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` What is the name of the main character in 'Mansfield Park'?
``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} cat(q2,longmcq(q2_choices)) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` Who is the author of Mansfield Park?
``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} cat(q3,longmcq(q3_choices)) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` Where is the main setting of Mansfield Park?
``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} cat(q4,longmcq(q4_choices)) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` Who is Fanny Price's wealthy uncle in Mansfield Park?
``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} cat(q5,longmcq(q5_choices)) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` Who is Fanny Price's love interest in Mansfield Park?
``` ::: :::
